00252 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00253 
00254 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00255 l4_factory_create_task_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00256                          l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, l4_fpage_t utcb_area,
00257                          l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00258 {
00259   l4_msgtag_t t;
00260   t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_TASK, target_cap, u);
00261   l4_factory_create_add_fpage_u(utcb_area, &t, u);
00262   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00263 }
00264 
00265 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00266 l4_factory_create_thread_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00267                            l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00268 {
00269   l4_msgtag_t t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_THREAD, target_cap, u);
00270   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00271 }
00272 
00273 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00274 l4_factory_create_factory_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00275                             l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, unsigned long limit,
00276                             l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00277 {
00278   l4_msgtag_t t;
00279   t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_FACTORY, target_cap, u);
00280   l4_factory_create_add_uint_u(limit, &t, u);
00281   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00282 }
00283 
00284 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00285 l4_factory_create_gate_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00286                          l4_cap_idx_t target_cap,
00287                          l4_cap_idx_t thread_cap, l4_umword_t label,
00288                          l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00289 {
00290   l4_msgtag_t t;
00291   l4_msg_regs_t *v;
00292   int items = 0;
00293   t = l4_factory_create_start_u(0, target_cap, u);
00294   l4_factory_create_add_uint_u(label, &t, u);
00295   v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00296   if (!(thread_cap & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT))
00297     {
00298       items = 1;
00299       v->mr[3] = l4_map_obj_control(0,0);
00300       v->mr[4] = l4_obj_fpage(thread_cap, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00301     }
00302   t = l4_msgtag(l4_msgtag_label(t), l4_msgtag_words(t), items, l4_msgtag_flags(t));
00303   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00304 }
00305 
00306 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00307 l4_factory_create_semaphore_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00308                               l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00309 {
00310   l4_msgtag_t t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_SEMAPHORE, target_cap, u);
00311   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00312 }

00386 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00387 l4_factory_create_start_u(long obj, l4_cap_idx_t target_cap,
00388                           l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00389 {
00390   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00391   l4_buf_regs_t *b = l4_utcb_br_u(u);
00392   v->mr[0] = obj;
00393   b->bdr = 0;
00394   b->br[0] = target_cap | L4_RCV_ITEM_SINGLE_CAP;
00395   return l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_FACTORY, 1, 0, 0);
00396 }
00397 
00398 L4_INLINE int
00399 l4_factory_create_add_fpage_u(l4_fpage_t d, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00400                               l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00401 {
00402   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00403   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00404   if (w + 2 > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00405     return 0;
00406   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_FPAGE | (sizeof(l4_fpage_t) << 16);
00407   v->mr[w + 1] = d.raw;
00408   w += 2;
00409   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00410   return 1;
00411 }
00412 
00413 L4_INLINE int
00414 l4_factory_create_add_int_u(l4_mword_t d, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00415                             l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00416 {
00417   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00418   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00419   if (w + 2 > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00420     return 0;
00421   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_MWORD | (sizeof(l4_mword_t) << 16);
00422   v->mr[w + 1] = d;
00423   w += 2;
00424   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00425   return 1;
00426 }
00427 
00428 L4_INLINE int
00429 l4_factory_create_add_uint_u(l4_umword_t d, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00430                              l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00431 {
00432   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00433   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00434   if (w + 2 > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00435     return 0;
00436   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_UMWORD | (sizeof(l4_umword_t) << 16);
00437   v->mr[w + 1] = d;
00438   w += 2;
00439   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00440   return 1;
00441 }
00442 
00443 L4_INLINE int
00444 l4_factory_create_add_str_u(char const *s, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00445                             l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00446 {
00447   return l4_factory_create_add_lstr_u(s, __builtin_strlen(s), tag, u);
00448 }
00449 
00450 L4_INLINE int
00451 l4_factory_create_add_lstr_u(char const *s, int len, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00452                              l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00453 {
00454 
00455   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00456   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00457   char *c;
00458   int i;
00459 
00460   if (w + 1 + (len + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t)
00461       > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00462     return 0;
00463 
00464   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_STRING | (len << 16);
00465   c = (char*)&v->mr[w + 1];
00466   for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
00467     *c++ = *s++;
00468 
00469   w = w + 1 + (len + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00470 
00471   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00472   return 1;
00473 }
00474 
00475 L4_INLINE int
00476 l4_factory_create_add_nil_u(l4_msgtag_t *tag, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00477 {
00478   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00479   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00480   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_NIL;
00481   ++w;
00482   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00483   return 1;
00484 }
00485 
00486 
00487 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00488 l4_factory_create_commit_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory, l4_msgtag_t tag,
00489                            l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00490 {
00491   return l4_ipc_call(factory, u, tag, L4_IPC_NEVER);
00492 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
